topPicks.title: Neon Sudoku Deluxe
topPicks.desc: Clean neon-style Sudoku with difficulty levels, mobile numpad, auto-check and smooth design.

topPicks.title: HexGL Space Race
topPicks.desc: Spaceship race through skycrapers. Really engaging!!!

topPicks.title: Neon Nodulus
topPicks.desc: puzzle game with a clever twist. Based on the mathematical theory behind plank puzzles, consists of a grid of cubes and rods which can be rotated with a swipe. Turn the activated cubes to reach the end cube and win the level.

topPicks.title: Pets Restaurant
topPicks.desc: Prepare food. Really nice game in the kitchen!!!

topPicks.title: Neon Dungeon Auto Shooter
topPicks.desc: Auto-shooter roguelike dungeon crawler with rooms, doors, minimap, loot drops, meta upgrades and characters.

topPicks.title: Neon Beat Tap
topPicks.desc: Tap lanes in time with the beat. Combos, accuracy and difficulty levels.

topPicks.title: Neon Auto Battler
topPicks.desc: Drag units to the grid and watch them fight automatically each round. Combine 3 to upgrade.

topPicks.title: Neon Runner Rush
topPicks.desc: Endless neon runner: jump, boost, collect coins, unlock skins.

topPicks.title: Survivor Arena
topPicks.desc: Survive waves in a shrinking safe zone. Upgrade between waves and unlock skins.

topPicks.title: Neon Arena
topPicks.desc: Dash, shoot and survive waves of enemies in a neon arena.

topPicks.title: Neo Runner
topPicks.desc: Run over obstacles and avoid enemies.

topPicks.title: Starfall Squadron
topPicks.desc: Vertical shmup: dodge bullets, grab powerups, defeat bosses.

topPicks.title: Stargrid Defense
topPicks.desc: Build towers along the path and stop enemy waves.

classic.title: Rock Paper Scissors
classic.desc: Pick your move and try to outsmart the computer in this timeless mini duel.

classic.title: Pac-Man
classic.desc: Classic Pac-Man arcade game — chase the ghosts and eat the pellets!

classic.title: Wall Bounce
classic.desc: Classic brick-breaker style game. Move the paddle, keep the ball alive, break bricks and chase high scores.

classic.title: Tower Defender
classic.desc: Side-scrolling retro shooter — protect your base and survive waves of enemies.

classic.title: Neon Puzzle
classic.desc: A clean and simple logic puzzle game with relaxing gameplay.

classic.title: Snake (Classic)
classic.desc: Retro Snake — eat food, grow longer and avoid crashing.

classic.title: Spider Solitaire
classic.desc: Classic spider-style arcade challenge with traps and tight movement.

classic.title: Tetris
classic.desc: The iconic falling-blocks puzzle game. Rotate, clear lines and chase the high score.

classic.title: Snake
classic.desc: Eat the food, grow longer and don’t crash into walls or your own tail.

classic.title: Tic Tac Toe vs AI
classic.desc: Play against an AI in this simple but tricky 3×3 grid battle.

classic.title: Whack-a-Mole
classic.desc: Test your reflexes by hitting moles before they vanish from their holes.

skill.title: Guess The Number
skill.desc: Pick a number range and try to guess it in as few tries as possible.

skill.title: Reaction Test
skill.desc: Wait for the screen to flash, then click as fast as you can.

skill.title: Memory Grid
skill.desc: Memorize the highlighted tiles and repeat the pattern.

skill.title: Typing Speed Test
skill.desc: Type the shown text as fast and accurately as you can.

skill.title: Higher / Lower
skill.desc: Guess if the next number will be higher or lower.

skill.title: Minesweeper
skill.desc: Clear the field without detonating any hidden mines.

skill.title: Simon Says (Colors)
skill.desc: Watch the color sequence and repeat it flawlessly.

skill.title: Mini Quiz
skill.desc: Answer quick questions across random topics.

skill.title: Timer Bomb
skill.desc: Defuse the bomb before the countdown hits zero.

skill.title: Pattern Lock
skill.desc: Recreate the shown lock pattern without mistakes.

skill.title: Sliding Puzzle (3×3)
skill.desc: Rearrange the tiles until the image is complete.

strategy.title: Stargrid Defense
strategy.desc: Place and upgrade towers strategically to stop endless waves of enemies.

strategy.title: Neon Arena
strategy.desc: A fast-paced arena where positioning, timing and upgrades matter for survival.

strategy.title: Neo Runner
strategy.desc: Plan your jumps and movement to chain safe paths through enemy-infested levels.

strategy.title: Starfall Squadron
strategy.desc: Pick the right powerups and flight path to survive bullet patterns and boss fights.
